GSP29vnyps12u:3: tadihānyathākhyātipakṣe viparyayasya saṃśayasya ca vyavacchedārtham “yathāvasthitavyavahārānuguṇaṃ jñānam” iti pramāṇalakṣaṇe yathāvasthitādiviśeṣaṇam /
GSP29vnyps12u:10: dvitīye tu pakṣe sāmānyato dharmisphuraṇe sati apratipannatadvirodhaviruddhaviśeṣādhyavasāya iti //
GSP29vnyps12u:12: tatra ekaviśeṣasphuraṇaṃ yathā--- pītaḥ śaṅkha ityādi /
GSP29vnyps12u:15: parasparaviruddhānekaviśeṣavatar idṛśasya viparyayasya saṃśayādbhedo mithovirodhābhimānaviraheṇa samuccitādhyavasāyaḥ /
GSP29vnyps12u:16: dharmavirodhe parasparāviruddhānekaviśeṣasphuraṇaṃ yathā--- vipulatvaikatvaviśiṣṭe candre alpatvadvitvādigrahaḥ /
GSP29vnyps12u:22: adharmaṃ dharmamiti yā manyate tamasā vṛtā /
GSP29vnyps12u:30: anyathājñānaṃ vastuno vastvantaratayā bhānam; yathā---śukteḥ rūpyatayā /
GSP29vnyps12u:31: viparītajñānaṃ tu yathāvat vastuni bhāsamāne yuktibhistasyānyathopapādanam;
GSP29vnyps12u:32: yathā---jñātṛtayā ahantvena ātmani bhāsamāne 'pi kuyuktibhirasyabhrāntitopapādanaṃ kudṛśām” iti /
GSP29vnyps12u:37: yathā---ūrdhvavastumātragrahaṇe sati tadvirodhitayānanusaṃdhīyamānayormithaḥsphuṭavirodhayoḥ sthāṇutvapuruṣatvayoḥ sphuraṇam---ayaṃ sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti /
GSP29vnyps12u:42: tasyaiva bahubhiryugapadadṛḍhasaṃyogaḥ saṃśayaḥ” ityātmasiddhigrantho 'pi na viruddhaḥ;
GSP29vnyps12u:48: yathā--- ātmā jñānaṃ vā jñātā veti,
GSP29vnyps12u:49: jñānaṃ dharmo dharmi vetyādi; tathāpyābhimānikaṃ parasparapratikṣepitvaṃ tatrāpyastyeva /
GSP29vnyps12u:58: pratyakṣatadābhāsavipratipatteḥ saṃśayo yathā--- cakṣuṣā samukhaṃ pratibhāti darpaṇatalam,
GSP29vnyps12u:59: sparśanena tvanyathā; kimidaṃ samukhaṃ nirmukhaṃ veti /
GSP29vnyps12u:65: evaṃ pāmarādivākyavipratipatterapi ---nadyāstīre phalāni santi, na santi vetyādi /
GSP29vnyps12u:69: anumānāgamavipratipatteryathā --- kiṃ paramāṇūpādānaṃ jagat, uta brahmopādānamiti eṣā dik //
GSP29vnyps12u:70: kecittu vipratipattiśabdamātre muhyanto vādivipratipattimeva vipratipattiṃ manyante,
GSP29vnyps12u:80: asādhāraṇadharmādapi kecit saṃśayamāhuḥ; yathā---gandhavattvāt pṛthivī nityā anityā vetyādi /
GSP29vnyps12u:83: tadayuktam; na hi tatra gandhavattvādinā saṃśayotpattiḥ,
GSP29vnyps12u:84: api tu vyatirekanirūpaṇavilambāprāgeva gandhādiviśiṣṭadravyasya nityānityasādhāraṇatayā bhāsamānairdravyatvādibhireva /
GSP29vnyps12u:87: gandhavattvāt pṛthivī nityā vā anityā veti tu yadā kaścidvyavaharet,
GSP29vnyps12u:88: tatrāpi gandhavattvaṃ nityatvānityatvayoranyatarasya prayojakaṃ na vā ityeva saṃdehaḥ /
GSP29vnyps12u:90: atha nityavyāvṛttadharmavattvādanityatvam anityavyāvṛttadharmavattvācca nityatvaṃ puraskṛtya nityā anityā veti saṃśate;
GSP29vnyps12u:93: gandhastu tatra sāmānyarūpastaṭasthaḥ; na tu hetuḥ //
GSP29vnyps12u:96: tathā vādiparigṛhītatvāderapi sādhāraṇatvāt vimativiṣayasya dharmiṇo vā sāmānyaveṣasya tadubhayasādhāraṇyāditi /
GSP29vnyps12u:98: punaścāyaṃ dvitricaturādiśirodhikaraṇabhedādbahuvidhaḥ; yathā--- ayaṃ sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti,
GSP29vnyps12u:100: tathā imau sthāṇū vā puruṣau vā, ete padārthāḥ satyā asatyā nirvacanīyā anirvacanīyā vetyādi /
GSP29vnyps12u:101: yastu dvayoranyatarasya coratve siddhe ayaṃ coraḥ ayaṃ vā cora iti saṃdehaḥ,
GSP29vnyps12u:102: sa tu ayaṃ coro na vā ityevaṃrūpasaṃśayadvayasamāhāraḥ /
GSP29vnyps12u:103: yadvā yaścoraḥ, saḥ ayam ayaṃ vā ityeka eva /
GSP29vnyps12u:110: pūrvo yathā--sthāṇvātmake vastuni sthāṇuḥ puruṣo veti /
GSP29vnyps12u:112: tatra nirūpakāṇāṃ prāyaśaḥ pūrva eva bhavati /
GSP29vnyps12u:114: yadvā nirīhasyaiva kadācit dvitīyena saṃśayena viparyayeṇa ca pravṛttasya daivāt tadātanārthasaṃnipātenābhimatalābha iti //
GSP29vnyps12u:115: punarapi imau saṃśayaviparyayau sāmānyadharmiṇo viśeṣāṇāṃ cānubhūyamānatvasmaryamāṇatvādibhedāt bahuvidhāvūhanīyāviti //
GSP29vnyps12u:116: kiṃsajñako 'yaṃ vṛkṣa ityevamādirūpo 'nadhyavasāyo nāmānyo jñānaviśeṣa iti kecit; tadasāram,
GSP29vnyps12u:119: ūhastu prāyaḥ puruṣeṇānena bhavitavyamityādirūpa ekakoṭisahacaritabhūyodharmadarśanādanutkaṭānyakoṭikaḥ sa eva /
GSP29vnyps12u:120: prāyaḥ puruṣeṇa bhavitavyamiti puruṣa evetyabhiprāyaścet yathocitaṃ pratyakṣānumānādiṣvanupraveśaḥ /
GSP29vnyps12u:126: āha ca bhagavān śaunakaḥ--- “dṛṣṭānumānāgamajaṃ dhyānasyālambanaṃ tridhā /
GSP29vnyps12u:128_1: viṣaya iti na kenāpi pramāṇena nirviśeṣavastusiddhiḥ” ityanyeṣāmanādaraḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP29vnyps12u:131: pratyakṣānumānāgamānāmeva ca mitho bhedo vedārthasaṃgrahe viśadamupapāditaḥ //
GSP29vnyps12u:132: yattu “mattaḥ smṛtijñārnamapohanaṃ ca” ityatra bhāṣyam--- “jñānamindriyaliṅgāgamayogajo vastuniścayaḥ” iti,
GSP29vnyps12u:135: uktaṃ ca śrīviṣṇucittaiḥ prameyasaṃgrahe--- “pramāṇasaṃkhyāvivāde 'pītyatra tripramāṇatvaṃ bhāṣyoktam” iti /
GSP29vnyps12u:136: bhāṣye ca keṣucit kośeṣu yathārthakhyātisamarthanadaśāyām--- “athavā kimanena bahunopapādanaprakāreṇa /
GSP29vnyps12u:137_1: sarvajñaṃ satyasaṃkalpaṃ paraṃ brahmābhyupagacchatāṃ kiṃ na setsyati kiṃ nopapadyate---”
GSP29vnyps12u:140: uktaṃ ca tattvaratnākare --- “pratyakṣādimūlānāṃ smṛtīnāṃ svasvamūle 'ntarbhāvavivakṣayā pramāṇatritvāvirodhaḥ /
GSP29vnyps12u:142: sa cācamanuvādaḥ pūrvopāttaḥ--- “smṛtiḥ pratyakṣamaitihyamanumānaṃ catuṣṭayam” iti pratyakṣādyaviśeṣeṇa vedānuvādācca---iti /
GSP29vnyps12u:143: prajñāparitrāṇe tu smṛtiprāmāṇyānabhyupagame 'pi jñānasya tāvat karaṇabhedāccāturvidhyamevoktam--- “tatrendriyārthasaṃbandho liṅgaśabdagrahau tathā /
GSP29vnyps12u:148: ityādinā svayaṃsiddhidivyayoḥ pṛthaṅnirūpaṇaṃ kṛtam, tat pratyakṣāvāntaravairūpyabodhanābhiprāyam /
GSP29vnyps12u:153: sākṣāttvaṃ ca jātirūpa upādhirūpo vā kaścit jñānasvabhāvaviśeṣaḥ svātmasākṣikaḥ //
GSP29vnyps12u:165: kimidaṃ vaiśadyaṃ nāma ? asādhāraṇākāreṇa vastvavabhāsakatvam--” ityādi //
GSP29vnyps12u:183: anyathā dharmādayaḥ kasyaciccakṣurgrāhyā iti vadato bauddhasya kiṃ prativakṣyasi /
GSP29vnyps12u:196: ata eva hi gīyate--- “divyaṃ dadāmi te cakṣuḥ---” ityādi /
GSP29vnyps12u:214: viṣayendriyasaṃbandhaśca---dravyeṣu saṃyogaḥ, dravyāśriteṣu rūpādiṣu tu saṃyuktāśrayaṇam /
GSP29vnyps12u:215: yathoktaṃ tattvaratnākare--- “atra vṛddhā vidāmāsuḥ saṃyogaḥ saṃnikarṣaṇam /
GSP29vnyps12u:240: prathamākṣasaṃnipātajā buddhirviśiṣṭaviṣayā, buddhitvāt, saṃpratipannavat, ityādyapi cintyam //
GSP29vnyps12u:243: na ca savikalpakaṃ na pratyakṣamiti vācyam, sākṣātkārābādhādyaviśeṣāt //
GSP29vnyps12u:252: “nirvikalpakamekajātīyeṣu dravyeṣu prathamapiṇḍagrahaṇam” ityādibhāṣyaṃ tu udāharaṇaparaṃ yojyam /
GSP29vnyps12u:253: ata eva hi śrīviṣṇucittairuktam--- “saṃskārodbodhasahakṛtendriyajanyaṃ jñānaṃ savikalpakam,
GSP29vnyps12u:254: ekajātīyeṣu prathamapiṇḍagrahaṇam dvitīyādipiṇḍagrahaṇeṣu prathamākṣasaṃnipātajaṃ ca jñānaṃ nirvikalpakam” iti /
GSP29vnyps12u:259: pratyakṣasya caivaṃ vibhāgo 'bhihitaḥ--- “dvividhaṃ caitat pratyakṣam--- arvācīnamanarvācīnaṃ ca /
GSP29vnyps12u:262: ata eva kudṛṣṭīnāṃ sanmātragrāhi pratyakṣamityavilakṣajalpitaṃ nirastam /
GSP29vnyps12u:264: bhrāntirūpo 'pi hi vikalpaḥ kṣaṇikatvānna viramya vyāpartumalam /
GSP29vnyps12u:266: na ca svayaṃ dharmipratiyogigrahaṇābhāve bhedagrahaṇaṃ manyase /
GSP29vnyps12u:267: tathāpi yadi kalpanā bhedaviśiṣṭaṃ yugapadgṛhṇāti, kā pratyakṣe sarpamṛtiḥ ?
GSP29vnyps12u:269: abheda iva bhedo 'pi svarūpataḥ pratītau na pratiyogisākāṅkṣaḥ;
GSP29vnyps12u:272: ata eva dharmadharmiṇordharmipratiyoginoranyeṣāṃ ca pratītāvanyonyāśrayo nirastaḥ /
GSP29vnyps12u:274: bhedaśabdena vyavahārasya tu pratisaṃbandhinirūpitākāre vyutpannatvāt tadapekṣā /
GSP29vnyps12u:275: bhedatvaṃ hi bhedānāṃ pratiyoginā nirūpyam na tu jātyādilakṣaṇaṃ svarūpam;
GSP29vnyps12u:278: gotvādi ca gṛhyamāṇaṃ svasmin svāśraye cāśvatvādyāropaṃ nirūṇaddhīti svasya svāśrayasya ca svayameva tasmādbhedaḥ //
GSP29vnyps12u:279_1: na saṃbhavatīti vadan bhedaduṣaṇārthameva bhedaṃ sādhayatīti svavacanavirodha iti //
GSP29vnyps12u:282: śabdajanyamapi pratyakṣamastīti ta eva varṇayanti; tadapyayuktam, vyāghātāt /
GSP29vnyps12u:283: na hi parokṣajananasvabhāvatayā siddhā sāmagrī viśeṣābhāve kvacit svabhāvamatipatet /
GSP29vnyps12u:284: na caikajātīyasāmagrītaḥ prasūtaṃ kāryaṃ vicitraṃ syāt,
GSP29vnyps12u:285: ekayaivava sāmagryā sarvajātīyotpattiprasaṅgāt ekasya kāryasya viruddhajātiyogaprasaṅgācca /
GSP29vnyps12u:287: 'daśamo 'ham' iti pratyayo hi nendriyasvātantryeṇodeti, kintu puruṣavacanānurodhena /
GSP29vnyps12u:289: evam 'dharmavāṃstvamasi' iti kārtāntikopadeśādau 'tādṛśo 'hamasmi' iti bodhe dharmāderapi pratyakṣatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29vnyps12u:292_0: pūrvāvagatadaśamabhāvaṃ tu puruṣaṃ pratyupadeśe bhāṣarāśipraviṣṭamaṣīnyāyena pūrvāparāparokṣaṇīnairantaryeṇa
GSP29vnyps12u:303: pratyakṣaṃ cidacinmayaṃ jagadidaṃ yasyetyanuśrūyate yaścānanyadhiyāmanantavibhavaḥ pratyakṣatāmaśnute /
GSP29vnyps12u:304: yaścaiko yugapatsadā svata idaṃ viśvaṃ darīdṛśyate prājñaṃ taṃ pratipannamokṣaṇavidhādakṣaṃ didṛkṣemahi //
GSP29vnyps12u:305: iti śrīkavitārkikasiṃhasya sarvatantrasvatantrasya śrīmadveṅkaṭanāthasya vedāntācāryasya kṛtiṣu nyāyapariśuddhau pratyakṣādhyāye dvitīyamāhnikam //
